The 2015 Brazilian Music Awards (), the 26th annual ceremony, was held at the Theatro Municipal in Rio de Janeiro on 10 June 2015, to recognize the Brazilian music of 2014. The ceremony was hosted by actors Dira Paes and Alexandre Nero. Maria Bethânia was honored at the ceremony.
Winners and nominees
The nominees were announced on 7 May 2015. Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
